review: Be aware that some network access points (many or all hotel wifis, some mifis) are set to disallow communications between devices on the same access point. If you do not have control of the access point and it is set to disallow traffic between clients (e.g. "Set AP Isolated" on ASUS routers), it will be very, very difficult to make Chromcast work.

review: I wanted the Chromecast to be my answer to life's greatest mysteries. Alas, it has fallen short and I only use it to stream Plex and play Pandora. The potential for this product is amazing, and the price cannot be beat for a streaming HD device, so I am firm at 4 stars - but I really WANT it to be 5! Audio tweaking is needed for Plex, but overall it is pretty solid.What I wish it could do :Second screen with iPad - It really needs this capability, do not limit to just Android.Stream as a dedicated HD monitor on a PCMore capable web management - this device has the capability to run as a PC itself, why limit it? It would be a great solution for media servers/extenders in home theaters to replace with this device and a dedicated media server stored somewhere else if it could just do more and you could install or package apps for the device itself (give it storage!).
